verbs.description: [ARG0: Most adults] [V: say] [ARG1: that the meeting between President Donald Trump and North Korean Leader Kim Jong Un was a good idea] , [ARGM-ADV: according to a Monmouth poll released Thursday] .
Most adults say that [ARG1: the meeting between President Donald Trump and North Korean Leader Kim Jong Un] [V: was] [ARG2: a good idea] , according to a Monmouth poll released Thursday .
Most adults say that the meeting between President Donald Trump and North Korean Leader Kim Jong Un was a good idea , [V: according] to a Monmouth poll released Thursday .
